availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert C. Champion (Livingston County, Kentucky, student and resident)

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, student and resident. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph B. Champion and Helena Champion. Married to Mary A. Green Champion. Resident in Livingston County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident in Livingston County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Livingston County, p. 354B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Division 1, p. 207.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Diershill, p. 209B.
Find A Grave, "Robert C. Champrion (March 5, 1839-November 13, 1926)," Memorial #45425239, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/45425239(accessed December 11, 2019).
